code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UpdateUser=()=>{const[id,setId]=useState('');const[name,setName]=useState('');const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();const response=await axios.put("http://localhost:8080/api/users/".concat(id),{name,email});console.log(response.data);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Update User"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:id,onChange:e=>setId(e.target.value),placeholder:"User ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),placeholder:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),placeholder:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Update"})]})]});};export default UpdateUser;
